commands.name: spam
commands.description: Spams a message a specified number of times

commands.name: hello
commands.description: Greets the user

commands.name: u
commands.description: Get information about a Twitch channel (your own if no channel is provided)

commands.name: pyr
commands.description: Creates a text pyramid with the specified height and message

commands.name: commands
commands.description: Lists all available commands

commands.name: roll
commands.description: Rolls a dice and returns a number between 1 and 100

commands.name: dog
commands.description: Sends a random dog picture.

commands.name: cat
commands.description: Sends a random cat picture.

commands.name: math
commands.description: Calculates a simple mathematical expression.

commands.name: stats
commands.description: Displays channel statistics like followers and views.

commands.name: lurk
commands.description: Marks you as lurking in the channel.

commands.name: shoutout
commands.description: Gives a shoutout to a specified user.

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Checks the bot's responsiveness.

commands.name: vanity
commands.description: Generates a vanity link for the specified user.

commands.name: subscribers
commands.description: Gets the subscriber count for a specified Twitch channel.

commands.name: channeluptime
commands.description: Displays the uptime of the specified channel.

commands.name: subscribeAge
commands.description: Get the age of a subscription for a user.

commands.name: logs
commands.description: Fetches user logs for a specific channel.

commands.name: goodnight
commands.description: Sends a goodnight message

commands.name: followage
commands.description: Check how long a user has been following the channel

commands.name: joke
commands.description: Tells a random joke.

commands.name: 7tvu
commands.description: Fetches and displays user info from 7TV.

commands.name: remind
commands.description: Sets a reminder for a specified user at a specified time.

commands.name: coinflip
commands.description: Flips a coin and returns heads or tails.

commands.name: upsidedown
commands.description: Flips the text upside down.

commands.name: reverse
commands.description: Reverses the specified name or text.

commands.name: timer
commands.description: Sets a timer for a specified duration.

commands.name: poll
commands.description: Creates a poll for users to vote on.

commands.name: ban
commands.description: Bans a specified user from the channel.

commands.name: timeout
commands.description: Times out a specified user for a duration.

commands.name: following
commands.description: Fetches all the users a specified Twitch user follows.

commands.name: setprefix
commands.description: Changes the command prefix.

commands.name: prefix
commands.description: Shows the current command prefix.

commands.name: status
commands.description: Displays the uptime of the bot.

commands.name: 7tvu
commands.description: Fetch user information from 7TV

commands.name: help
commands.description: Provides help and documentation for available commands.

commands.name: addwhitelist
commands.description: Adds a specified channel to the whitelist.

commands.name: removewhitelist
commands.description: Removes a specified channel from the whitelist.

commands.name: join
commands.description: Adds the bot to a specified channel.

commands.name: part
commands.description: Removes the bot from a specified channel.

commands.name: afk
commands.description: Sets your status to AFK (Away From Keyboard).
